DESCRIPTION: Store sensor noise information of your camera here. Ensure the following fields exist as a value to the provided key: PHOTON_INFLUX, INTEGRATION_TIME, APERTURE_DIAMETER, and DARKNOISE_FIGURE. Each field should include a Name, units, mean, stddev. Mean and stddev will default to 0 if missing. Fields will default to ideal if missing. Use the IDEAL/GOOD/BAD/UGLY examples to build up custom classes.
